title: Bug 49299Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 - custom cookie name not affecting URL rewriting
description: Bug 49299Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 describes that custom cookie name should affect URL rewriting, but it does not seem to be working as expected.
OB: In chapter 7.1.1 of servlet30finalspec.pdf, it is mentioned that if a web application configures a custom name for its session tracking cookies, the same custom name should be used as the name of the URI parameter when session id is encoded in the URL (assuming URL rewriting is enabled). However, the actual result observed is different. The page sends a cookie with the name 'MYSESSIONCOOKIE', but the 'Reload' link on the page uses 'jsessionid'.
